results.name: Triangle in A144385 with rows left-adjusted.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..100, flattened
Moa Apagodu, David Applegate, N. J. A. Sloane, and Doron Zeilberger, Analysis of the Gift Exchange Problem, arXiv:1701.08394, 2017.
David Applegate and N. J. A. Sloane, The Gift Exchange Problem (arXiv:0907.0513, 2009)
maple: b:= proc(n) option remember; expand(`if`(n=0, 1, add(
seq(seq(T(n, k), k=n..3*n), n=0..6);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, May 31 2018
mathematica: b[n_] := b[n] = Expand[If[n == 0, 1, Sum[b[n - j]*Binomial[n - 1, j - 1], {j, 1, Min[3, n]}]*x]];
Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, 6}, { k, n, 3n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jul 10 2018, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
xref: Cf. A144385. Row sums give A144416.
